name: Joust Chaos
description:
Greetings traveleth'r! doth thee wanteth to taketh parteth in the tourney?

***

In "Joust Chaos" you have to control a knight for whom the tournament is not limited to a battle with spears. In the game, you need to accelerate as fast as possible and, using the village animals as a springboard, make your way to the beautiful princess. For your victories, you, like all valiant knights, will receive gold coins, which can be spent on useful shiny armor, or to buy a spear.

The game is presented at a very early stage of development, so it only contains some of the content that was originally conceived. The presented version of the game contains:

  • Basic gameplay.
  • Various village animals with unique characteristics.
  • 2 upgrades to improve

You can download the .apk file of the game to play it on the Android system.

Also, along with the game files, you can download an archive with concept art of the future characters of the game.
